title: Hovering over Tahm Kench in Champ Select; there is no name or description for his ult.
body:
There is only the icon for his ult when you hover over him in champ select. Fitting I suppose because only the damage part matters usually lol

http://i.imgur.com/7UbbsC4.png

replies.body:
Hiya Left 4 Doge,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
While on the topic of bugs with Tahm Kench, it seems about 30-40% of the time when eating minions, I'm unable to spit them back out at an enemy. I have to just wait the duration then spit it out
This is a known issue, and the Champion team is working to resolve it. (I'm on skins, so unfortunately, I don't have much more information. D:)
Thanks for that information! I've been posting this issue for some time and I just thought it was being overlooked. Good to know that its a known issue though :D
His ult is so broken that I thought Rito left it intentionally broken in champ select. Oh well.
